# The `MemSDNode` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This is an abstract virtual class for memory operations. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::MemSDNode</CodeBlock>

### getMergedOrdering() {#ab82eed0d6910bbb28ef05c224d541e88}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="AtomicOrdering llvm::MemSDNode::getMergedOrdering () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return a single atomic ordering that is at least as strong as both the success and failure orderings for an atomic operation.

(For operations other than cmpxchg, this is equivalent to <a href="#a9e13c962466d74908fd163cf3fde05ee">getSuccessOrdering()</a>.)

### getRawSubclassData() {#ae80c6b39fd20683261c5f48f849693c7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::MemSDNode::getRawSubclassData () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return the SubclassData value, without HasDebugValue.

This contains an encoding of the volatile flag, as well as bits used by subclasses. This function should only be used to compute a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/foldingsetnodeid">FoldingSetNodeID</a> value. The HasDebugValue bit is masked out because CSE map needs to match nodes with debug info with nodes without debug info. Same is about isDivergent bit.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h/#l01378">1378</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/selectiondagnodes-h">SelectionDAGNodes.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getSuccessOrdering() {#a9e13c962466d74908fd163cf3fde05ee}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="AtomicOrdering llvm::MemSDNode::getSuccessOrdering () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return the atomic ordering requirements for this memory operation.

For cmpxchg atomic operations, return the atomic ordering requirements when store occurs.
